casebody.data:
In the Matter of Gerald L. HUBBARD and Vivian Hubbard, Bankrupt. James E. ALEXANDER, Jewel B. Alexander and Joel Mithers, Trustee in Bankruptcy, Appellants, v. Gerald L. HUBBARD and Vivian Hubbard, Defendants. No. 75-3176. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. June 15, 1978. *99Walter M. Modler, (argued), Encino, Cal., for appellants. Earle Hagen, (argued), Beverly Hills, Cal., for defendants.

Before BARNES and HUFSTEDLER, Circuit Judges, and NIELSEN, District Judge.*

The Honorable Leland C. Nielsen, United States District Judge for the Southern District of California, sitting by designation.

 BARNES, Senior Circuit Judge:

We find no error and no abuse of discretion on the part of the District Judge, and adopt his opinion appearing in the Clerk’s Transcript at pages 45 to 47.1

We affirm the dismissal.

APPENDIX

. See Appendix.
